oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Excerpt from consolidation interview with Elizabeth Jacobs, December 22, 1994
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An excerpt from an interview with Elizabeth Jacobs, conducted on December 22, 1994 by Carole Bucy as part of the Metro Consolidation Oral History Interviews. Jacobs discusses her role in the consolidation of the city and county governments. She also comments briefly on other individuals and their contributions. The complete record of the interview is available at the Metro Government Archives.
